alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Becker; East Otter Tail; Hubbard; Mahnomen; South Clearwater; Wadena; West Becker; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 12:27PM CST until March 01 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northwest and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Significant drifting snow will make travel very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will continue to diminish this afternoon. Blowing snow and drifting snow will continue to linger through the afternoon hours.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
